mapper.select: SELECT * FROM (SELECT A.*, row_number() over (order by message_no desc) rnum FROM message A WHERE A.member_id=#{member_id}) WHERE RNUM BETWEEN #{startRow} AND #{endRow}
SELECT * FROM (SELECT A.*, row_number() over (order by message_no desc) rnum FROM message A WHERE A.message_receiver=#{member_id}) WHERE RNUM BETWEEN #{startRow} AND #{endRow}
mapper.update: update message set message_yn='Y', message_rDate=current_date where message_no=#{message_no} and message_yn='N'
mapper.delete: delete from message where message_no=#{message_no} and member_id=#{member_id}
